divs: sighting detailsi suspect this can all be explained but last thursday, october 28, at 5:45pm me and my 3yr old son were driving home on pacific coast highway heading north and there was a strange drop-down cloud that had several spirals inside. this drop-down cloud (for lack of a better term) was very bright. to the south of this drop-down cloud was a large round bright circle shining through the clouds. this was strange to me because it was a definitive circle. in one photo there appears to be a greyish orb like thing in the sky next to the bright bright cirle. i did not see this orb like thing until i looked at my photo's. anyway, i thought it was odd enough to take some pictures. thanks [witness name removed cms\dr]
Summary: Weird drop-down cloud with swirling pattern inside, a large round brightness in a the sky near the drop-down cloud. See photo's
trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
